About Me

my journey & experience...

BIO

I am a new developer and a former professional dancer. As I was wrapping up my dance career, I developed a great interest in the intersection of technology and sustainability. I took action by devoting time to online courses, and that is how I discovered my passion for code, which led me to enroll in the full-stack software engineer immersive at The Flatiron School. An essential component of my transition into tech is to find a company that is a leader in its industry and also aligns with my values, providing an opportunity to make a real difference with code.

I am excited about great ideas that bring together groups of people to work on innovative solutions.

My artistic background has given me the opportunity to travel, work with people from different backgrounds and develop a deep commitment to focusing and learning fast.

I have great enthusiasm and self-motivation to learn new things to add to my skill set, one of the things I enjoy the most.

I'm a native Spanish speaker, English is my second language, and I am also fluent in Italian.
